metadata.title: CVE-2023-5346 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Type confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 117.0.5938.149 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
